title: Caster, 1875–1900
markings: Marks: On bottom, in underglaze blue: "AK"
provenance: Purchased at Winter Antiques Exposition, NY, about 1955 by WPW
description: 6-footed scroll base, stem formed by 3 twisted dolphins; 3-sided shell- shaped body; twisted, cap-shaped top with pierced holes, surmounted by small spiral finial; painted in underglaze blue on white with dolphins on stem, man with violin on one side panel, floral and leaf motifs top section

tombstone.epitaph:
Caster, 1875–1900.
1875–1900. earthenware, glaze. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-28.
